control_attributes.Control: SA-4 (1) FUNCTIONAL PROPERTIES OF SECURITY CONTROLS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to provide a description of the functional properties of the security controls to be employed.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to produce a plan for the continuous monitoring of security control effectiveness that contains [Assignment: organization-defined level of detail].

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to provide a description of the functional properties of the security controls to be employed.
Control Name: SA-4 (1) FUNCTIONAL PROPERTIES OF SECURITY CONTROLS
